title: 2 sets of same runes
body: On my runes pages for many runes for some reason I have 2 sets, like it shows say x9 magic pen marks and be illuminated/highlighted and also like x6 magic pen marks but not illuminated/highlighted. 9 is the max you can/should be able top have right. It's kind of annoying but I guess not like a huge deal but anyone experiencing the same thing and or know how to idk, fix it?????

replies.body: If you have double runes exceeding 9, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We can take a look into removing them, or see if there might be something more going on like a visual issue.  We'll see you there!
